website_summaries.verdict: The Propet TravelFit Pro received a lot of positive feedback because it was stylish and lightweight. The various width options appealed to many individuals too. The removable insole was another positive feature which the purchasers loved. However, there were complaints the soft upper material, the narrow sole, and the quality issues. In the end, the verdict as to whether it is the best footgear to wear for long distances or periods was debatable as many recommended replacing the insole for more underfoot comfort and support.
pros: Droves of owners stated that the Propet TravelFit Pro was one of the most comfortable walking shoes they have ever owned
The availability of various widths pleased a lot of shoppers
Numerous reviewers enjoyed how light this model felt on their feet
The trainer was considered stylish and the available colorways delighted a myriad of wearers
Many users liked that the insole was removable as it allowed them to use their custom orthotics
Plenty of buyers thought that the arch support on this footgear was adequate
The merchandise kept the feet cool, according to a good number of commenters
cons: The upper material did not provide enough lateral support because it was too soft, noticed several critics
Some people noted a few quality issues which included the webbed eyelets tearing off and the outsole deteriorating quickly
The sole unit was not wide enough which made a few testers feel like their feet were hanging out of the shoe

customer_reviews.title: The most perfect shoe. No break in time and the fit ...
customer_reviews.text: The most perfect shoe. No break in time and the fit was perfect. I need wide shoes and this pair fit perfectly. I have gotten other style of Propet shoes and they never fail me. Lightweight and perfect for work. Loved them so much , I got 3 pairs in assorted colors.
customer_reviews.author: Red Robin

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not comfortable for normal all-day wear so I definitely won't wear them for any moderate walking activities. Skechers, Fila. And Acsis are much more comfortable. These have little to no cushioning. The only pro is that they are very light weight. Very disappointing, Propet used to have great walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sooo many books...

customer_reviews.title: These are super light, and so comfy it's like slippers
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled to find these shoes! With my gigantic 11EE feet I've always had to wear mens sport shoes which are clunky, heavy and ugly. These are super light, and so comfy it's like slippers. The uppers are a woven nylon type stuff with a large open weave. I can see how they would easily snag and tear if you wore them for yard work, for instance. The sole is very light and flexible. My usual size 11's were way too big, and even ordering down a size makes for a comfortable not-snug fit. Will be my shoe for life.
customer_reviews.author: Su Bee

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. I have large feet, plus bunions and other delights. I can never find anything that fits.... but these not only fit, they are light and comfortable. I needed something for an ambitious trip. Now considering a second pair. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a shoe like this for a very long time. I wanted color, but most of all comfort and fit. For me this shoe has everything. I have diabetic feet so fit without any edges or pressure on the inside is super important, and I have a wide foot. What can I say? This is the best shoe I have ever worn right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Laurine Dyson

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. I am a senior citizen and on weekends I work with my daughter in her small business. I am on my feet for 8+ hours on both weekend days. The shoes are extremely light-weight and very comfortable. And they are stylish, too. I like them much better than I expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, yet lacks good quality. It doesn't last as long as other brands. Foot has full range of motion, which was nice. It lacks any support however. I did receive compliments on the style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found women's shoes that fit my Flintstone feet!  11 4E.
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled to be able to find shoes wide enough to fit me. No more wearing men's shoes or shoe boxes. Seriously! My left foot is 4.7 inches wide and my right 4.5. That is wide. When I found they fit I just about cried. I can wear woman's shoes again with awesome colors! First thing my husband said... "Let's go out somewhere..."
customer_reviews.author: Tucson

customer_reviews.title: You Will Want These Shoes in Numerous Colors
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so cute and comfortable. The pink color is vibrant and eye catching. This was my second pair of Propet's becauseI loved my fist pair so much I needed a second color option. The weight of the shoes is so unbelievably light-such a bonus. Price is reasonable too
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: SUCH a comfortable shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to shoe for any day I’m on my feet for long! They are REALLY comfortable and I am SUPER picky about comfort. I have some medical conditions that make life miserable, but finding good shoes helps a ton! I have kind of wide feet, but I stuck with the normal width and they fit great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Great wide-width athletic shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I have very wide feet, and am on my feet most of the day. These shoes are wide enough and comfortable enough for all day wear, and as a bonus, they are purple. I will also add that I plan to purchase many more shoes and boots from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lee M

customer_reviews.title: Proper Shoes Comfortable and Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are comfortable and because of the lack and white weave do not show the dirt. They accept my orthotics and wear well. I have had two pairs of these shoes and would gladly order another pair. Mostt comfortable--and I like to walk a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: These were comfortable and I did not encounter the issues that others ...
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hospital laboratory. I am on my feet 6 out of the 8 hours of my shift. These were comfortable and I did not encounter the issues that others had mentioned with no sole support. I was actually quiet comfortable. I love the color and the fit was exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: smcollison

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES FOR THE HARD TO PLEASE
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THESE FOR MY MOTHER WHO IS 96 AND SHE LOVES THEM! SHE IS VERY HARD TO PLEASE. SHE IS IN A WHEELCHAIR AND USES HER FEET A GREAT DEAL. SHE TRAVELS FAST! THESE ARE THE FIRST SHOES SHE HAS NOT COMPLAINED ABOUT. MY SISTERS WERE AMAZED AND ARE GOING TO BUY A PAIR FOR THEMSELVES!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary J. Kinder

customer_reviews.title: Great for orthotics.
customer_reviews.text: Better than I had hoped, in terms of room for my orthotics and still plenty of toe room. The soles don't seem to be all that cushioned, but I may just be used to trainers and not walking sneaker soles. Still, really lightweight and cool, would be great to pack. The lacing latticework is a bit tricky to adjust, but it does look cute :-)
customer_reviews.author: meli

customer_reviews.title: ZERO Support!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible for walking or even standing! This shoe has ZERO support. Even with foot inserts, my feet began to ache just from standing in them. Seriously, flip flops have more support than these Propet Women's Travelfit sneakers. I had to return the shoes as I needed them for heavy walking.
customer_reviews.author: RollickingReader

customer_reviews.title: I bought two pair and am quite happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and not many sneakers come in wide width. These do and they fit perfectly, are reasonably priced and come in bright colors. I bought two pair and am quite happy with them. If you get a pair, I'd advise Scotchguarding them before you wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Daffox

customer_reviews.title: The 4W Fit Diabetic feet!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried since I was having to return 3 other pairs of shoes but these were WIDE enough! Very happy with this purchase for my mom who is diabetic and has trouble finding comfy shoes to fit! :)
customer_reviews.author: GettinginShape

customer_reviews.title: Fifth Pair
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 pairs of Propet shoes now. I like that they are soft so it “gives” for my bunion. I do order them 1/2 size bigger than I normally wear and purchase a better insert for my arch to customize them for my foot issues.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are so super comfortable on my very wide feet, I feel like I'm walking on air. Not overly supportive which is also good for my feet. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is so comfortable! The fit and width was perfect. The only complaint I had was the sneaker was too lightweight and that’s my own personal feeling because I’m a little on the heavy side and would have liked a thicker sole. But I would still rate this item a five for comfort and fit!!
customer_reviews.author: Angeline Davis

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look cute, but are made very poorly. The first pair I owned had a loop the laces go through break the first time I wore them. I contacted Amazon and had a replacement sent. The second pair had the exact same issue occur within the first few times of wearing them. These shoes are barely worn and already broken - don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these Propet shoes, the color is great. Mostly their shoes are so comfortable that every pair I own is great.
customer_reviews.author: lillie jean garrett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, very light-weight.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these a few times now, and so far am pleasantly surprised. They're very light, and I've had no problems after a lot of walking. I wish they were slip-resistant so I could wear them at work. Now that would be a good test!
customer_reviews.author: D. Millwood

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband, he's absolutely rocking the pink shoes! It's always tricky trying to get the size right in women's shoes for a guy, but these fit him perfectly. Thank you for the great selection of wide shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good Shoes, they have holded up very nicely and they fit my wide feet perfectly. Definitely recommend these for People who have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: GET A PAIR!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pair of Propet shoes and these are the most comfortable of all! I have problem feet and need a wide width shoe that still looks good and this one really fits the bill. Breathable, soft on the feet; can't ask for more than that! Highly recommend. And, as an aside, the purple matches my LSU gear perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hultgren

customer_reviews.title: NOT WIDE
customer_reviews.text: NOT WIDE. I ordered a 2e and it EXACTLY as wide as a pair of champions regular width i got at a local shoe store. So disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have used propet shoes for years, but these are particularly comfortable. And cheap..was lucky enough to wear the size that was only $32!
customer_reviews.author: sweetjami

customer_reviews.title: The Only Shoe I Haven't Sent Back
customer_reviews.text: My feet are short and wide. Even the Extra Wide that I have been ordering have not been comfortable. I can wear these shoes all day without my feet hurting. They are lightweight and just feel good on my feet. Ordered 6 Extra Wide and will order them again. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: catladyFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable my feet swell during the day but these are ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable my feet swell during the day but these are so comfortable I don't notice it. Have tried 5 different style & brands & now have 2 pair of these.may order another for the future in case they stop selling this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Runs incredibly large
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6 or 6.5 in most brands, so I thought I'd be safe ordering a 6EE but instead, got a pair of clown shoes-there was at least 2.5" of space at the end of my toe. They don't make 5s in extra width, so these were returned without a replacement. Looked like they would be comfy, but disappointed by how far off the sizing was-what a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: I have a super tough time trying to find shoes that fit me ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a super tough time trying to find shoes that fit me and the Propet shoes are ideal..... I receive soooo many compliments. I bought the blue and black, and am thinking about buying the pink as well....
customer_reviews.author: Acadia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, very light weight, true to size for length, but run narrow. I wear a wide and needed to buy an extra wide.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Dube

customer_reviews.title: Summer feet!
customer_reviews.text: Great summer shoe. Comfortable walking but if you walk long distances in concrete, they could be more padded underfoot.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Perrone

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE FOR WIDE FEET AT GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This brand has excellent shoes for my extra wide feet. They are not overly expensive and look nice. I now own four pair!
customer_reviews.author: Damiano

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable. It is like wearing slippers. They provide great support.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Herman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are very comfortable they feel like slippers and the color is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Carol maysa

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderful in several ways. They are the first pair that I could comfortably wear all day on the first day. The color is great fun. They are soft, flexible and supportive; the kind of shoes that you buy in every color in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a really nice, light comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice, light comfortable shoe. Sometimes shoes in my width (double wide) don't have shoelaces that are long enough, but these are. Since they are so lightweight I wasn't sure how well they would wear or last. I've worn the shoes for several months on a pretty regular basis in a job where I'm on my feet quite a bit and they have not had any problems. I liked them so much I bought a couple more pairs in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schollian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Talking about a very nice fitting shoe...this is it! It is soft and has great cushion! Love wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Simonton

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: Cute, lightweight shoe for walking. I can wear my brace inside the shoe and the light weight shoe offsets the weight of the brace I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Irish

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful light weight shoes that fit by extra wide feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful light weight shoes that fit by extra wide feet (9 1/2 E). They breath well and have good support (although I did add an insole because I always do).
customer_reviews.author: M. Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got a wide eeee. Being stretchy they are very comfortable. Sole is flexible. So far i have got them in 4 colours.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie neal

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: I loved all about the shoe except the cheap feeling of the inside materials and not enough arch or foot support , if that was fixed itd be a fav
customer_reviews.author: KATHY

customer_reviews.title: Proper shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable. The fit is great and I love the color and it's light weight. I really love this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Suzan Darnell

customer_reviews.title: I love propet shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love propet shoes. They are actually wide width like they say they are. I can put them on and go all day the very first day
customer_reviews.author: Carol Peterson

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable! I have a wide foot and these fit ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! I have a wide foot and these fit perfectly without ordering the wide size. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MAR

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and look
customer_reviews.text: My 90 year old Mom is hard to fit with such a narrow foot (8 1/2 AA). She wanted a pair of light weight sneakers and these fit her just great. They are comfortable and we all like the look and color.
customer_reviews.author: Dorinski

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and fit true to size. Lightweight everyday gym shoe. I would not recommend them as a real walking/running shoe. Good for normal rerunning errands type of shoe. I put insoles which fit easily for more arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Light weight casual walking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love Propet's light weight sneakers. I have many styles and colors. I don't wear socks with these. These are not for running. Pretty, the color is exactly as seen in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very light in weight, yet have great support for my weary feet. They make walking enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great color and value
customer_reviews.text: Great color and value. I love Propet shoes as they are good for my straight last kind of feet. (Flat and wide).
customer_reviews.author: J. H. K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes. Great brand.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I’ve owned several pairs of Propet shoes. I like that this style actually has laces your can tie. I have 2 pairs of this style and mostly wear to my exercise classes but also nice for everyday. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: i have hard to fit feet. these work great for me.
customer_reviews.author: barbara Colwell

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my daughter in the 4E size to fit over her orthotics. They go on very easily and look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer1

customer_reviews.title: Great Wide-foot fitting Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My Mother has very wide feet and these fit her really good. Wide enough in the toe area so she doesn't have toenail pain. She is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: vgm

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit true to size. They could use a little more arch support, but the fit is right on the money. bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, very comfortable, love the color. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: TMdist11

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Fits larger than it should. doesn't feel like a shoe. Feels more like a slipper. Zero support. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: It sd it was a great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: It sd it was a great walking shoe. I tried them on and they were comfortable but they didn't have much of a sole. Pretty thin and not very supportive. I returned them before actually wearing them for any length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Love the Look
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they look, and they are light weight and pretty comfortable. They just fit a little big.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Dunkley

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, feel great! Great walking shoe for the price
customer_reviews.author: MAHen

customer_reviews.title: Nothing exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: Do not find them any more comfortable than most others like them. I still find the Goga Mat/Max (a Skechers foot bed) the most comfortable to walk & stand on, especially for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes !
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom. She loves them. Most comfortable shoes she has ever had. Very happy I bought these for her.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: A very bright shoe. The pink looks a bit softer than it actually is.
customer_reviews.text: It will probably be a light and comfy shoe for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Croxson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Pretty color and the fit was great. Very comfortable. It's nice to get a pretty color for a wide shoe. Thank you for carrying them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P. Abarca

customer_reviews.title: Would like to return the shoes and get a larger size
customer_reviews.text: Would like to return the shoes and get a larger size. Not happy that they are not returnable for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dlesa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light weight!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Propets. We travel a lot and wore this brand of shoes in South America, Europe, Africa and the Middle East. I love them! They are attractive, comfortable and extremely light weight! And washable, too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality less than
customer_reviews.text: I have many Propet shoes. These are the same size but are tight fitting and appear to be of a lesser quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Smith Kline

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these. This is my 2nd pair of this ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. This is my 2nd pair of this brand. Even bought a pair for my mom. We both have narrow feet so the narrow width works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Ang

customer_reviews.title: Available in hard to find big and wide!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for an extra large, extra wide women’s foot!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Allen

customer_reviews.title: Can walk all day without feet getting tried.
customer_reviews.text: Propet band of shoes/sneakers are very comfortable and well made. These sneakers live up to the Propet reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, very light and comfortable. And they look good.g

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color is Pepto Bismol pink. Much brighter than the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love Propet-I have bunions and the "no seams" and soft bed are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: GaleJ

customer_reviews.title: As comfy as is pretty
customer_reviews.text: It is so comfortable and stylish. Easy to put on and take off. Colors are bright and do not fade!
customer_reviews.author: Salt Peter

customer_reviews.title: pink
customer_reviews.text: they was not comfortable like walking with no souls in the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Tammara Pride

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe, good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sister when she needed shoes for rehab in physical therapy. She said they were extremely comfortable and the bonus is they looked cute!
customer_reviews.author: Cecy G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and cute. I took out the insole and put in one that has the arch support I needed.
customer_reviews.author: poemgirl

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe Thank you Propet for making shoes in ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe Thank you Propet for making shoes in my size and such cute colors and styles I'm very happy with quality
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable attractive shoes for fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. Love these shoes! So cute and so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elsea

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Widths are available
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several Propet sneakers in size10, 2A N. I like them because they fit my narrow feet very well and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Fits well!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking sneakers Fit nice with my 4E canoe feet.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my mother and she loves them. They fit perfect and are very comfy for her.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Fries

customer_reviews.title: Don't order if you want a wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe in wide and they are not wide at all. They fit like a medium. Disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with wider feet
customer_reviews.text: I wear 9 4E propet or sketchers Mens 8 4E. But I like that carry more colors than sketchers which usually stuck with gray or navy. Propet sneakers still give me comfort without sacrificing style.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my sister is wearing these and they are comfy -
customer_reviews.author: C. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love these and they are comfy as well as priced right!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Searcy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and I love the color. My feet feel so happy!

customer_reviews.title: and comfortable for a 9 hour physical work day
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, durable, and comfortable for a 9 hour physical work day.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. Will continue to but these!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this brand and size for years, these run tight.
customer_reviews.author: peace247

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Propet Sneakers they are great for people with wider feet!

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: Look good, feel great, good shoe to wear to Jazzercise in.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: PropetShoes make me feel like dancing... and walking 😉👍🏻!!️
customer_reviews.text: Finding Propet Shoes is like winning the lottery!!! I'm a former ballet dancer and those having what I call ‘ballet feet’ understand; you develop a hard to fit bony structure that makes your walking an agony :( !! After a ‘cementery’ of ‘can’t stand these either’ I came across my first pair of Propet Shoes and the heavens opened up :)) !!! They have the best fitting EXTRA EXTRA EXTRA Wide shoes that look beautiful, cuddle your feet and don't look like clown shoes... YAY and ThankYou Propet, you make me feel like dancing 💃🏼 😊!!️
customer_reviews.author: miamiladybug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First shoe that my daughter can just slip her foot into since it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald K. Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for practicing tai chi
customer_reviews.text: I wear them in my tai chi class. They fit very well, they're very comfortable and move very smoothly on the floor. Will certainly be purchasing another pair in the not too distant future.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I Love these shoes! They are so comfortable. Almost like going barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: SharonK

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT
customer_reviews.text: I WEAR A WIDE SIZE BUT ALOT OF TIMES THE WIDE SHOES FOUND IN STORES ARE JUST ALITTLE TIGHT STILL. I ORDERED AN E SIZE FOR ENTRA WIDTH. GLAD TO HAVE FOUND THEM AND LOVE THEIR SELECTIONS
customer_reviews.author: DIANE JEAN

product_meta.title: Propét womens WAA012M Travelfit Pro
product_meta.description: The travel fit is your perfect travel companion. fun jacquard knit colors will be uniquely you.
